Land allotment for Manmohan Singh's memorial after registration of Trust - The Times of India
summary:
Land Allotment for Manmohan Singh's Memorial After Trust Registration

Publication Date: N/A Source: N/A

The article discusses the recent progress in the establishment of a memorial for former Prime Minister Manmohan Singh following the registration of a new trust.

  • The trust has been officially registered to oversee the memorial's establishment.
  • Land has been allocated for the construction of the memorial.
  • This initiative aims to honor Manmohan Singh's contributions to India.
"The memorial will serve as a tribute to the significant impact of Manmohan Singh on Indian politics and economy."

This move marks an important step in commemorating the legacy of one of India's prominent leaders.
newTitle: Land Allotment for Manmohan Singh's Memorial After Trust Registration
